TopicTitle: How much delta V for all my different manoeuvre nodes?

Articles.Content:
The game tells me how much delta V I need to expend to complete my next manoeuvre node but what about the one after that and that one after that?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-17T01:06:18Z" title="04/17/2015 01:06  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 17, 2015</time> by THX1138**

> 
> The game tells me how much delta V I need to expend to complete my next manoeuvre node but what about the one after that and that one after that?

You can see the delta-v required on future nodes by hovering your mouse over it when it's in a collapsed star/gear icon. You might have to right click somewhere else if you're in the maneuver node's "edit" mode where you can drag the ends to change the planned burn. Here's a screenshot to help explain what I mean:

![ManeuverNodes.PNG](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/w/images/7/73/ManeuverNodes.PNG)
That's where you have to use something like a [ÃŽâ€v map](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/w/images/7/73/KerbinDeltaVMap.png) to plan ahead to see what the next maneuver will be.

[Precise Node](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47863-0-90-0-Precise-Node-1-1-2-Precisely-edit-your-maneuver-nodes) has a 'trip info' button which will show and sum all the delta-v for every node you've made ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
